description: Checklist TDD workflow enforcement - validates commit prefixes and ensures changes are committed

hooks.prompt: MANDATORY for git commit commands: (1) Message MUST start with [B] or [S]. (2) Message MUST include GitHub issue number from MASTER_PLAN section header, e.g. [B] Add feature (#42). (3) When ALL tasks in a section are complete, close the issue: gh issue close <number>. (4) Run npm run test:unit first.
